mapper.select: select a.*,c.sp_name from cg_other_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cgo_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=#{status} and a.history=1

select a.*,c.sp_name,f.StarterName as starterName,b.status as status FROM cg_other_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cgo_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi LEFT JOIN (SELECT mode_id,StarterName from (SELECT * from flowhistroy order by do_date ASC) f LEFT JOIN cg_other_contract a ON a.cgo_id=f.mode_id GROUP BY mode_id ) AS f on a.cgo_id=f.mode_id where (b.status=1 or b.status=2 or b.status=3) and a.history=1 order by contract_sign_time desc
mapper.update: update cg_other_contract set contract_name=#{cgo.contractName}, cgo_no=#{cgo.cgoNo}, work_no=#{cgo.workNo}, prj_name=#{cgo.prjName}, cgoc_type=#{cgo.cgocType}, cgo_contract_money=#{cgo.CgoContractMoney}, contract_name_jia=#{cgo.contractNameJia}, contract_name_yi=#{cgo.contractNameYi}, pay_mode=#{cgo.payMode}, contract_sign_time=#{cgo.contractSignTime}, contract_summary=#{cgo.contractSummary}, work_content=#{cgo.workContent}, cgo_department=#{cgo.cgoDepartment}, freight=#{cgo.freight}, shuilv=#{cgo.shuilv}, shuijin=#{cgo.shuijin} where cgo_id=#{cgo.cgoId}
mapper.select: select *,c.sp_name from cg_other_contract a left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where cgo_id=#{id}

select cgo_id,cgo_no,contract_name,prj_name,work_no,c.sp_name from cg_other_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cgo_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and a.history=1
select cgo_no from cg_other_contract where cgo_id=#{id}
select a.*,c.sp_name from cg_other_contract a left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where a.cgo_no=#{cgoNo} and a.history=0
select count(1) from (select distinct cgo_no from cg_other_contract where cgo_no like #{year}) as a

select cgo_id,contract_name,cgo_no,cgd_no,prj_name,work_no,contract_name_yi,c.sp_name,cgo_contract_money from cg_other_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cgo_id =b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and a.history=1
select cgo_id,contract_name,work_no,contract_name_yi,prj_name,cgo_contract_money from cg_other_contract where cgo_no=#{cgoNo} and history=1
select cgo_no,work_no,prj_name from cg_other_contract where contract_name=#{contractName} and history=1
select cgo_id,cgo_no,contract_name,prj_name from cg_other_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cgo_id =b.mode_id where a.work_no=#{no} and a.history=1 and b.status=2
select cgo_id,cgo_no,work_no,contract_name from cg_other_contract a left join mode_status b on a.cgo_id =b.mode_id where a.prj_name=#{name} and a.history=1 and b.status=2

select *,c.sp_name from cg_other_contract a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cgo_id=b.mode_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and a.cgo_no=#{no} and a.history=1

SELECT contract_name,cgo_no,cgoc_type,cgo_contract_money,c.sp_name FROM cg_other_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cgo_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN sourcing_purchasing as c on c.sp_id=a.contract_name_yi where b.status=2 and work_no like #{no} and a.history=1
mapper.update: UPDATE cg_other_contract SET history=0 where cgo_no =(select a.cgo_no from (SELECT cgo_no from cg_other_contract WHERE cgo_id=#{id}) AS a)
UPDATE cg_other_contract SET history=1 where cgo_id=#{id}

work_no=#{cgo.workNo},

where cgo_id=#{cgo.cgoId}
mapper.select: select * from cg_other_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cgo_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and a.cgo_no=#{cgoNo} and a.history=1
select a.cgo_no from cg_other_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cgo_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and a.history=1 and a.work_no=#{no} order by a.work_no asc
